name: tractor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 a motor vehicle with large back wheels and thick tyres, used on farms for pulling machinery
Examples
The wheels of the heavy tractor furrowed the soft ground.A tractor pulled the trailer full of hay bales.We had to use a tractor to pull the car out of the mud.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a motor vehicle with large back wheels and thick tires that is used on farms for pulling heavy loads and machinery
